TopicTitle: Craft with several small tanks in a stack deadlocks the game.

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4790K CPU @ 4.00GHz 4.00 GHz | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 | RAM: 32 GB

 

I was trying to test how effective the auto strut behavior was so I created an admittedly silly ship. Stacked 30 small short fuel tanks with a large command pod at the top and a large engine at the bottom, then hit launch. The game went to the loading screen, then never loaded into game and stopped responding.  I waited over 5 minutes just to make sure it wasn't just loading slow but it never recovered. I'll include the craft file which reproes it 100% on my computer, though really just build a tall stack of small fuel tanks and this seems to occur.

 

Included Attachments:

IKnowThisIsABadDesign.json
Obviously that shouldn't happen, but the wobble fix is coming in For Science! not this patch
